original_text: “‘If anyone becomes aware that they are guilty—if they unwittingly touch anything ceremonially unclean (whether the carcass of an unclean animal, wild or domestic, or of any unclean creature that moves along the ground) and they are unaware that they have become unclean, but then they come to realize their guilt;
korean_text: 만일 누구든지 부정한 것들 곧 들짐승의 사체나 부정한 가축의 사체나 부정한 곤충의 사체를 만졌으면 부지중이라고 할지라도 그 몸이 더러워져서 허물이 있을 것이요

sentences.original_text: If anyone becomes aware that they are guilty
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 누군가 자신이 죄책이 있음을 깨닫는다면

sentences.original_text: if they unwittingly touch anything ceremonially unclean
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 그들이 부주의하게 의식적으로 부정한 것을 만진다면

sentences.original_text: whether the carcass of an unclean animal
or of any unclean creature that moves along the ground
and they are unaware that they have become unclean
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들이 자신이 부정하게 되었음을 모른다면

sentences.original_text: but then they come to realize their guilt
sentences.korean_translation: 그러다 그들이 자신의 죄를 깨닫게 된다면
